mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (USER_NO, USER_ID, NICKNAME, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, GENDER, AGE, EMAIL, PHONE, MBTI, SURVEY, STYLE, CERTIFICATION, INTEREST) VALUES(SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL,#{userId},#{nickname},#{userPwd},#{userName},#{gender},#{age}, #{email},#{phone},#{MBTI},#{survey},#{style},#{certification},#{interest})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO,USER_ID,NICKNAME,USER_PWD,USER_NAME,GENDER,AGE,EMAIL,PHONE,MBTI,SURVEY,STYLE,REPORT,WARNING,M.ENROLL_DATE,CERTIFICATION,M.STATUS,INTEREST, FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "PROFILEIMG" FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (NICKNAME=WRITER) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND M.STATUS IN ('Y','A')

SELECT USER_NO,USER_ID,NICKNAME,USER_PWD,USER_NAME,GENDER,AGE,EMAIL,PHONE,MBTI,SURVEY,STYLE,REPORT,WARNING,M.ENROLL_DATE,CERTIFICATION,M.STATUS,INTEREST, FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "PROFILEIMG" FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (NICKNAME=WRITER) WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND M.STATUS IN ('Y','A')
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET SURVEY = #{survey} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE WRITER = #{writer} AND STATUS IN ('Y','A')

SELECT NICKNAME,GENDER,AGE,NVL(STYLE,'미선택') STYLE,NVL(REPORT,0) REPORT,CERTIFICATION,(FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME) PROFILEIMG FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(NICKNAME = WRITER) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND NICKNAME = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_WRITER = #{nick}

SELECT BOARD_NO,ZONE_NO,INFO_NO,CATEGORY,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_DATE,GOOD,REPORT,COUNT,STATUS,BOARD_WRITER,CHOICE FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_WRITER = #{nick} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT FILE_NO,BOARD_NO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH,UPLOAD_DATE,FILE_LEVEL,STATUS,WRITER FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_WRITER,BOARD_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS')"CREATE_DATE",GOOD,INFO_ADDRESS FROM BOARD JOIN INFO USING (BOARD_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT R.REF_QNO) AS BOARDCOUNT FROM REPLY R INNER JOIN BOARD B ON R.REF_QNO = B.BOARD_NO WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REPLY_WRITER = #{nick}

SELECT REPLY_NO,CONTENT,R.CREATE_DATE,REPLY_WRITER,REF_QNO,R.STATUS,BOARD_TITLE FROM REPLY R JOIN BOARD B ON (BOARD_NO=REF_QNO) WHERE REPLY_WRITER = #{nick} AND R.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT C.BOARD_NO,CATEGORY,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_WRITER,FILE_PATH FROM CHOICE C JOIN BOARD B ON(C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (B.BOARD_NO=A.BOARD_NO) WHERE C.WRITER = #{nick} AND FILE_LEVEL = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE SERVICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE SERVICE_NO = #{serviceNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
